about.title: About
about.desc: We help maintenance teams work smarter with powerful tools designed for modern asset management.
about.content-description-1: TechFlow was developed to solve the common challenges faced by maintenance teams. Our platform simplifies complex workflows, reduces downtime, and helps organizations maintain critical infrastructure with less effort.
about.content-description-2: We believe that great maintenance management shouldn't require engineering degrees or weeks of training. Our intuitive interface makes powerful asset management accessible to everyone on your team.

features.title: Features
features.desc: Everything you need to manage your maintenance operations in one place.
features.card-1-desc: Track equipment details, location, maintenance history, and performance metrics all in one place.
features.card-2-desc: Create preventive maintenance schedules, set recurring tasks, and optimize your team's workflow.
features.card-3-desc: Assign, track, and manage maintenance tasks with detailed instructions and attachments.
features.card-4-desc: Manage spare parts, set minimum stock levels, and generate purchase orders automatically.

maintenance.title: Maintenance
maintenance.desc: TechFlow provides data-driven insights to optimize your maintenance operations and reduce costs
maintenance.card-1-desc: Optimize maintenance schedules based on actual equipment usage and condition
maintenance.card-2-desc: Automated alerts and prioritization based on critical system analysis
maintenance.card-3-desc: Predictive algorithms anticipate failures before they occur
maintenance.card-4-desc: Smart stocking recommendations based on maintenance patterns
maintenance.content_desc: TechFlow transforms raw maintenance data into actionable intelligence. Our advanced analytics engine continuously monitors equipment performance, maintenance history, and operational patterns to generate insights that help you:
maintenance.content-item-1: Identify potential failures before they occur with predictive maintenance
maintenance.content-item-2: Optimize maintenance schedules to reduce unnecessary work and extend equipment life
maintenance.content-item-3: Make smarter inventory decisions with usage-based stocking recommendations
maintenance.content-item-4: Identify cost saving opportunities through detailed operational analytics
